languages.text: {n}Вигдис вздрагивает от слов Кассии и случайно срывает один из рычагов {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}. Панель под ее пальцами искрится, а вокс-передача замолкает. Быстро переключив нужные тумблеры, она виновато кланяется.{/n} "Простите, что прервала разговор, Лорд-капитан! Я впервые слышу {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}, что говорит устами {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g}. Связь восстановлена. Подобное... больше не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис вздрагивает от слов Кассии и случайно срывает один из рычагов {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}. Панель под ее пальцами искрится, а вокс-передача замолкает. Быстро переключив нужные тумблеры, она виновато кланяется.{/n} "Простите, что прервала разговор, Лорд-Капитан! Я впервые слышу {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}, что говорит устами {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}. Связь восстановлена. Подобное... больше не повторится".

languages.text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис вздрагивает от слов Кассии и случайно срывает один из рычагов {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}. Панель под ее пальцами искрится, а вокс-передача замолкает. languages.text: {n}音阵大师被卡西娅的话吓得退了一步，不小心按下了{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}的某个开关。她手指下的面板发出了火花，通讯器陷入了静默之中。她随即迅速地拨动了一系列开关，满怀愧疚地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“我很抱歉不小心切断了音阵广播，舰长大人！我之前从来没有通过{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}导航者{/g}聆听{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}亚空间{/g}的话语。音阵连接已经恢复了，这种事情不会再发生了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师被卡西娅的话吓得退了一步，不小心按下了{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}的某个开关。她手指下的面板发出了火花，通讯器陷入了静默之中。她随即迅速地拨动了一系列开关，满怀愧疚地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“我很抱歉不小心切断了音阵广播，舰长大人！我之前从来没有通过{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}导航者{/g}聆听{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}亚空间{/g}的话语。音阵连接已经恢复了，这种事情不会再发生了。”

languages.text: {n}カシアの言葉に反応したヴォクス・マスターは、誤って{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}のレバーを1つ折ってしまう。指の下のパネルが火花を散らし、音声通信送受信装置は沈黙する。彼女は素早くスイッチを切り替え、後ろめたそうにお辞儀をする。{/n}「放送を中断して申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン！{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を通して話しているのを聞いたのは初めてだったもので。接続は回復しています。もう二度とこのようなことは起きません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの言葉に反応したヴォクスマスターは、誤って{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}のレバーを1つ折ってしまう。指の下のパネルが火花を散らし、音声通信送受信装置は沈黙する。彼女は素早くスイッチを切り替え、後ろめたそうにお辞儀をする。 {/n}「放送を中断して申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン！{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を通して話しているのを聞いたのは初めてだったもので。接続は回復しています。もう二度とこのようなことは起きません」

{n}カシアの言葉に反応したヴォクス・マスターは、誤って{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}のレバーを1つ折ってしまう。指の下のパネルが火花を散らし、音声通信送受信装置は沈黙する。彼女は素早くスイッチを切り替え、後ろめたそうにお辞儀をする。{/n}「放送を中断して申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン！{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を通して話しているのを聞いたのは初めてだったもので。接続は回復しています。もう二度とこのようなことは起きません」

languages.text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin weicht bei Cassias Worten zurück und betätigt versehentlich einen der Hebel des {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitators{/g}. Das Bedienfeld unter ihren Fingern sprüht Funken, und der Vox-Transmitter verstummt. Rasch legt sie mehrere Schalter um und verbeugt sich schuldbewusst.{/n} "Ich entschuldige mich vielmals für die Unterbrechung der Übertragung, Lord Captain! Ich habe den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} noch nie durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} sprechen hören. Die Verbindung ist jetzt wiederhergestellt. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin weicht bei Cassias Worten zurück und betätigt versehentlich einen der Hebel des {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitators{/g}. Das Bedienfeld unter ihren Fingern sprüht Funken, und der Vox-Transmitter verstummt. Rasch legt sie mehrere Schalter um und verbeugt sich schuldbewusst.{/n} "Ich entschuldige mich vielmals für die Unterbrechung der Übertragung, Lord Captain! Ich habe den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} noch nie durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} sprechen hören. Die Verbindung ist jetzt wiederhergestellt. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse-vox tressaille en écoutant les paroles de Cassia et brise accidentellement l'un des leviers du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}. Des étincelles crépitent dans la console sous ses doigts, et l'émetteur vox se coupe. Elle actionne immédiatement une série d'interrupteurs et s'incline d'un air coupable.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses pour avoir interrompu le signal, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je n'avais encore jamais entendu le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} parler par l'intermédiaire d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. La connexion est rétablie. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse-vox tressaille en écoutant les paroles de Cassia et brise accidentellement l'un des leviers du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}. Des étincelles crépitent dans la console sous ses doigts, et l'émetteur-vox se coupe. Elle actionne immédiatement une série d'interrupteurs et s'incline d'un air coupable.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses pour avoir interrompu le signal, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je n'avais encore jamais entendu le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} parler par l'intermédiaire d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. La connexion est rétablie. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »

languages.text: {n}La maestra de vocos retrocede ante las palabras de Cassia y parte accidentalmente una de las manivelas del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}. Del panel bajo sus dedos saltan chispas y el voco amplificador queda en silencio. Activa una serie de interruptores rápidamente y se inclina, arrepentida.{/n} «¡Mis más profundas disculpas por interrumpir la transmisión, Lord Capitán! Nunca había oído a la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} hablar a través de una {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}. La conexión está restaurada. No volverá a ocurrir».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de vocos retrocede ante las palabras de Cassia y parte accidentalmente una de las manivelas del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}. Del panel bajo sus dedos saltan chispas y el voco amplificador queda en silencio. Activa una serie de interruptores rápidamente y se inclina, arrepentida.{/n} «¡Mis más profundas disculpas por interrumpir la transmisión, Lord Capitán! Nunca había oído a la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} hablar a través de una {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}. La conexión está restaurada. No volverá a ocurrir».

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı, Cassia'nın sözleri karşısında irkiliyor ve kazayla {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarın{/g} kollarından birini koparıyor. Parmaklarının altındaki panelden kıvılcımlar çıkıyor ve voksyayar sessizliğe gömülüyor. Hızla bir dizi tuşa basıyor ve suçlulukla boynunu eğiyor.{/n} "Yayını kestiğim için büyük utanç duyarak özürlerimi sunuyorum Lord Kaptan! Daha önce {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutun{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} vasıtasıyla konuştuğunu hiç duymamıştım. Bağlantı yeniden sağlandı. Bir daha olmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master recoils at Cassia's words and accidentally snaps one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} levers. The panel beneath her fingers emits sparks, and the vox-caster falls silent. She quickly flips a series of switches and bows guiltily.{/n} "My abject apologies for cutting off the broadcast, Lord Captain! I have never heard the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} speaking through a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} before. The connection is restored now. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks Üstadı, Cassia'nın sözleri karşısında irkiliyor ve kazayla {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}ın kollarından birini koparıyor. Parmaklarının altındaki panelden kıvılcımlar çıkıyor ve voksyayar sessizliğe gömülüyor. Hızla bir dizi anahtarı çeviriyor ve suçlulukla boynunu eğiyor.{/n} "Yayını kestiğim için büyük utanç duyarak özürlerimi sunuyorum Lord Kaptan! Daha önce {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}un bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} vasıtasıyla konuştuğunu hiç duymamıştım. Bağlantı yeniden sağlandı. Bir daha olmayacak."
